column4: ok, I've downloaded all the gstreamer codecs in the repository and I still can't play dvds
I had already downloaded vlc, but it didn't work
vlc > open medium > choose dvd 'n drive ?!
the drive works fine, I have this as dual boot and it works in Windows and worked fine last week with 9.04
run vlc from trml to see error outp.
what do you get from trml ?
- nope, that didn't work either, I think some of the codecs may be corrupt or incomplete how I can do a reinstall?
I don't think so, it'll be rather a problem with permissions or changed places, vlc brings everything by default, some more tries :
sudo apt-get update  && sudo apt-get upgrade
check if your non-root user is allowed in audio and access of the dvd-drive
